articles.description: Apple Music and the iOS App Store are having issues, as Apple says outages are affecting “all users.” Problems users are seeing include songs that won’t play as well as lossless audio and Dolby Atmos issues.
articles.content:
Missing labels, lyrics and songs that just wont play
Illustration by Alex Castro / The Verge
If youre an Apple user, then you might be seeing some problems in the App Store or with Apple Music. App… [+1322 chars]
